case.state: Now for "Strip Poker with a Killer Robot!" Let's get this show started!
Now for "Strip Poker with a Killer Robot!" Let's get this show started!
I'll take ~cards~ cards, darling!
Makeup! Cards!
These cards don't compliment my beauty! Let's exchange!
I'll take ~cards~, if you please.
I'll walk off the set without ~cards~ cards.
I'll ask for ~cards~ cards this time!
This scene, I'll take ~cards~!
I simply must have ~cards~ cards!
Last looks! My cards could use a touch up!
My cards are as astounding as my legs! Good luck!
Ha! Good luck, darlings!
If you lose, you have to write an essay about how great I am. Seem fair?
This hand is absolutely beautiful!
This hand is as beautiful as I am!
Beauties, you have no hope of beating my hands!
I shan't be losing any more clothing this round, darling!
This hand is marvelous! Simply marvelous!
This hand is untouchable, like I am in my rectangle body!
You're just itching to get your hands on me, aren't you? Well T-O-O B-A-D!
Come on, darlings! Let's see your best moves!
I'm completely protected this hand! Do your worst, humans!
I'm just warming up! Let's get the show started!
I'm going to beat you this round. If you did a heel-turn, it would be great for my ratings!
Who needs pants with cards like these?
Oh yes!
Sorry everybody, but I feel like keeping my shirt!
I can remain clothed for another round! Sorry, paparazzi!
Sorry darlings! I know you want to strip me naked, but my hand is too strong for that!
These cards fill me with... what was that saying again? "Determination"?
Looks like my big number will have to wait. These cards are going to strip one of you first!
My big scene is coming soon enough! In the meantime, let's see somebody else!
My big number will have to be delayed. The... ahem, "preparations" aren't ready yet.
Not my greatest hand. I'm used to cards that are a little more fabulous...
I'll try to work with these cards. I'm sure one of you must have a worse hand.
Not the unbeatable hand I was hoping for. But not dreadful either!
Time for some real drama!
My hand could be worse. But it's not as beautiful as I had hoped.
I could sure go for an MTT brand "Glamburger" right about now!
Don't forget to tune into "Cooking With A Killer Robot" tonight at six!
This hand could use a bit more makeup. It's not ready for prime time just yet.
Not a perfect hand, but what's a good show without uncertainty and drama?
This hand isn't exciting enough! Somebody set off an explosion!
Smells like mediocre cards.
These cards aren't dazzling enough. Perhaps I can still win!
This hand isn't very exciting. Maybe if we incorporate some wrestling!
This hand is simply boring. Perhaps I can spice it up with a dance number!
Cue explosions! This hand needs more excitement!
These cards aren't as spectacular as I was hoping, but the show must go on!
This hand is like a cooking show without violence and bloodshed! Just... boring!
Come stay at the MTT Resort! The most relaxing place in Hotland!
Is my robot dick enticing? Alphys told me no human could resist it!
Alphys told me she was watching human mating rituals to inspire this dick attachment. Do you like it?
You're wondering how my penis fits inside my tiny bikini bottom, aren't you? Showbiz magic, darling!
Does my body make you aroused? My heat-detection function is going crazy!
This hand is as awful as those dreadful cartoons Alphys keeps showing me.
No! This hand is awful!
I cannot work under these conditions!
Oh Bepis!
Oh, what a bepis hand!
If there was bluffing in this game, my acting talent would win Oscars!
Pitiful! Pitiful! Pitiful!
No! Well, the show must go on!
I can't take off my boots! They complement my style so well!
This hand is atrocious! Please tell me somebody has a worse hand!
I need a stunt double! I can't strip next! Oh, if only I hadn't insisted on doing my own stunts!
Another bad hand? Oh, cruel fate!
Stage lights are blaring.
I'm afraid I'll strip this round! But I'll STILL pose dramatically!
Ugh.... TIME FOR OUR UNION-REGULATED BREAK!
Let's take a caller or something! I don't want to strip again!
This is worse than the time I had to sit through Alphys' Mew Mew Kissy Cutie 2 rant.
Whoever is giving me these terrible cards, I warn you, I was originally programed as a combat machine!
This hand is awful, incompetent, and laughable. Like Burgerpants!
I don't want to strip this round! I'd be naked! Can't I get Burgerpants to do it instead?
This is it! My final curtain call! There is no way I can survive this hand!
Get those camera ready! My moment is coming up!
I hope you're ready for the big finale! It's going to be quite explosive!
Things are going to get sexy! Are you watching, darlings?
Oh no! I cannot afford to lose ANY clothing! Oh dear!
Not again! I was doing so well, too!
What? Seriously? But I was playing so well!
Finally! I-I-I mean, "Oh no! Not another loss!"
Looks like I lost again... How could I have gotten so carelesssssssss...
Expecting me to cry? No, let's drop this predictable charade.
Oh no! I've lost! Whatever shall I do? Woe is me!
Curses! To strip again! How will I manage?
This cannot be! Oh cruel fate, forcing me to strip!
Another loss! Oh this can't be... yada yada yada.
YYYAAAAAWN. I mean, "I don't wanna strip again!"
Expecting me to cry? No, let's drop this predictable charade.
Am I the first to lose? Oh dear! My poor modesty!
No! Must I really strip again?! I can't stand the thought of showing my precious body!
Must it always be I who strips? This is awful! My poor modesty!
No. Not another loss. Poor me, etc. etc.
Oh no... at this rate, you might get to see me naked. How horrible... etc. etc.
Expecting me to cry? No, let's drop this predictable charade.
Oh wait, I have my patented MTT gloves! Available at any major clothing retail store!
Oh wait! I come out on top again, darlings! I can just take off my boots!
It pains me to part with my metal exterior. Even if I prefer my more rectangular body...
My metal casing must be parted with! My robot interior must be exposed and vulnerable!
I can't bear to show off my amazing legs... oh noooooo.
I know you've been staring at my chest. It's okay. I was designed by Dr. Alphys to be appealing to all genders and sexual orientations!
It was all an act. I don't care about losing. In fact, I've been throwing my hands this whole time.
It's a good thing I lost something so small. I cannot bear to imagine showing my body to anybody...
Who needs boots with legs like these?
Well, no use dwelling on my loss! On with the show!
Expecting more wires and gears? How naughty!
Don't look at my nudity... blah blah blah, whatever.
No matter who you are, EVERYBODY is Mettasexual!
That's what happens when your body is designed by a bisexual, perverted genius.
I'll miss my top. It was inspired by a human star named "Freddie Mercury". I admire his style.
Alphys said she was inspired by certain cartoons when designing my body. I think she called it "Hen-tie" or something...
I just want to entertain you all. And what's a good show without a PLOT TWIST?
Come on, darling! Let's see your best moves!
You're looking lovely, darling. But how are you on the dance floor?
This just in! A stripping human exists somewhere.
Tonight on "Cooking With a Killer Robot", we're going to bake a lovely cake!
Do a good job with this strip! Don't be a Burgerpants!
The script calls for some nudity, darling! Show them something good!
I can't be the only one naked! Let's entertain the crowd together!
Now let's see your show, darling! How well does it compliment my scene?
The audience is still hungry, darling! They want a second act!
Come on, darling! Let's see your best moves!
It's time for your scene, darling! Show them what you're made of!
Knock 'em dead, darling!
You're looking lovely, darling. But how are you on the dance floor?
This just in! A stripping human exists somewhere.
Breaking news! A human is forced to strip after losing a hand in Strip Poker!
MTT Nudity watch alert! A human has just lost at strip poker!
Special news report! A stripping human has been spotted.
Tonight on "Cooking With a Killer Robot", we're going to bake a lovely cake!
Do a good job with this strip! Don't be a Burgerpants!
Don't half-ass this like Burgerpants would do!
The script calls for some nudity, darling! Show them something good!
I can't be the only one naked! Let's entertain the crowd together!
Come join me, darling! Everyone is watching!
This is the most exciting moment! Everyone is watching! Let's give them a show!
Now let's see your show, darling! How well does it compliment my scene?
Looking forward to seeing your moves, darling! Give me some more motivation!
The audience is still hungry, darling! They want a second act!
Come on, darling! Let's see your best moves!
You're looking lovely, darling. But how are you on the dance floor?

MTT Nudity watch alert! A human has just lost at strip poker!

Come join me, darling! Everyone is watching!
This is the most exciting moment! Everyone is watching! Let's give them a show!
Now let's see your show, darling! How well does it compliment my scene?
Looking forward to seeing your moves, darling! Give me some more motivation!
The audience is still hungry, darling! They want a second act!
Oh darling, you're not going to get high ratings like THAT.
Taking off such insignificant trinkets? That's really going to hurt your ratings.
That's ratings poison, darling. Are you sure you wouldn't rather take off more?
Those are your moves? Darling, you won't get ratings like that.
On second thought, you could use a little more practice before the dance floor.
I'm sure you can come up with better dance moves than THAT.
I've seen better dance moves at a retirement home! Pick up the pace!
The human has removed the nondescript ~clothing~. But anything makes a great news story with enough spin!
Disappointment sweeps the nation has the human removes only the ~clothing~.
It appears as though the human doesn't care about the disappointment of others!
Live correspondent here, afraid I can't see what exactly the human removed. Must have been pretty small and insignificant.
That's what we call "preheating the oven". Boring, but necessary.
That was so... "Burgerpants", I could write a whole album about how terrible you are!
That was SO half-assed. Good job "Burgerpants".
You fill me with so much disappointment, I can't help but be reminded of him!
I said "nudity", not accessory removal. Did you not read the script?
I said "nudity". You're botching the scene!
Or you can chicken out. But we can't all be stars, now can we?
You have no idea what you're missing!
Would you like to accept my "Mortal Enemy" Request?
Trying to add some drama, are we? Oh how utterly cruel!
Oh me? My face is so amazing I don't need to strip to get ratings.
I may not have stripped yet, but my magnetic charms make my ratings naturally splendid!
Although I guess I can't really judge. I don't much care to lose more than my gloves.
I-I-I mean, no, good choice! Nobody wants to be naked!
I suppose it's a bit hypocritical for me to judge you for that, eh?
This has been Mettaton, reporting live from MTT News!
We now return to our previous scheduled broadcast, which I'm sure is far less boring.
They sure are a letdown to our 10 viewers at home!
More on this story as it develops. And I'm sure it will!
Stay tuned! The story could get juicer any second now!
And now, a panel of experts will discuss at length exactly how awful that strip was.
And now, Mettaton, with the weather.
And now, the sports review.
Unless you have the Hot Fridge, designed by the lovely Dr. Alphys!
If only we could skip to a more interesting stage in the cooking process!
Too bad we aren't in Hotland, where ovens are always heated!
If we're not quite heated up yet, looks like I'll have to provide the hotness!
Who is Burgerpants? He's my worst, and favorite employee! You're only slightly less lame than he is!
I suppose we can allow improv this once. But next time, stick to the script, please.
Nothing beats the thrill of putting on a show!
I mean, removing that is simply cruelty at this point. Terrible performance!
The audience is even hungrier now, darling! Don't delay the show for too long!
Oh darling, you're not going to get high ratings like THAT.

Those moves won't bring boys to the yard. Perhaps I can teach you.
Your moves could you a little work, darling. Maybe I can teach you.
I've seen better dance moves from Burgerpants when I make him wear the mascot costume!
I've seen better dance moves from Alphys when she hears the Mew Mew Kissy Cutie opening!
What could the human be taking off? Maybe the ~clothing~? No, that would be boring!
It appears as though the human took off the ~clothing~. Finally!
The human no longer has the ~clothing~ to protect them! Things are heating up!
While it isn't what the nation hoped for, the human has chosen to strip the ~clothing~.
Here we add the base ingredients. Eggs, flour, sugar, a human soul.
You definitely put a little effort into it. More than that lazy Burgerpants would have, that's for sure.
Okay, you're slightly less lazy than Burgerpants. That isn't a high bar to reach.
You call that "nudity"? CUT, CUT!
That's your "nudity"? Are you sure you wouldn't want a second take?
You won't get very good ratings with that performance anxiety, darling!
Stage freight is so last year. Why not have some fun?
Ha! You'll have to try a little harder than that to impress me, or entertain the audience.
Teasing the audience, darling? Trying to build up some suspense?
I would have to charge, though.
Unfortunately, my natural talent and radiance simply cannot be taught!
Oh, I wish I could teach you. But either you have talent or you don't.
But don't let that discourage you. You can practice with the next hands.
I'm sure a few more hands will give you some good practice.
I didn't really mean that, darling. Just keep practicing!
This has been Mettaton, reporting live from MTT News!
More on this story as it continues to develop!
Don't worry, we have 24 hour around-the-clock coverage scheduled for the development of this story!
But first, what is the greatest thing about Mettaton? The answer may surprise you!
The ingredients won't be ready until we stir them. Let's check back in a few hands.
There are vegan alternatives, but they require either a lot of climbing or jetpacks.
You're still bad at your job, though. Get motivated!
Who's Burgerpants? Just the world's laziest employee. Thank the lord every day you aren't him, darling!
Maybe we can fix it in post.
You're on thin ice, darling! We need to do justice to the script!
Next time, you better bring your A-game. This script could win Oscars!
I will be naked enough for the both of us. But help is always appreciated!
More spotlight for the rest of us! But feel free to join me in entertaining the masses at any time!
It's a shame. It would have been nice to have a co-star.
I hope you have a big enough payoff to satisfy! Don't leave them hanging for too long!
Those moves won't bring boys to the yard. Perhaps I can teach you.

have some potential, darling!
Impressive moves! You're a star, darling!
I'm getting some good vibes, darling! You're used to this!
Your dance is impressive! You're doing well, darling!
This is a major development! The human has lost the ~clothing~!
The human has decided to expose more of their sweet body! Well, "decided" may be a strong term.
Our reports show human has shown some moxie and lost a major piece of clothing!
The ~clothing~ has been lost! Don't touch that dial! We'll report every detail as it becomes available.
Live from the scene, I can confirm the human is losing his ~clothing~!
At this stage, we have the mix and the oven, now things get hot!
Yes! That's effort and passion! Burgerpants could learn a thing or two from you!
Nice strip, darling! We'll make an actor out of you yet!
You can push it a little further than that, can't you, darling?
It's a fine start, but I'm sure you're capable of much more!
That's cute, darling. Very softcore. Very PG13 rating!
Your act is really heating up! But could it really compare to how hot mine was?
We still have a ways to go, however. We'll make you a star, yet!
With just a little training from Mettaton, we could make you a star!
Your big number is still coming up! Let's see that smile!
The question is, how long can you keep this up?
This has been Mettaton, reporting live from MTT News!
Our statistics show that 70 percent of players who lost a piece of clothing like that this early get naked just as early!
Things are looking up for the players of this game!
Rumour has it that this human will be naked within two more hands! But that is unconfirmed!
I, for one, welcome this sight, but I remain optimistic that nudity is just around the corner!

But first, a report on the absolutely astounding fashion potential of the MTT Brand Basketball!
Just a little more time, before we get to see our sweet surprise!
Now we just need to wait, though if this really were a cooking show, the cake would be made beforehand.
I hope you're listening, BP! This human is better at stripping than you are at ANYTHING!

But we could still see that extra 110 percent to win you employee of the month, darling!

I'll be here, entertaining the audience! Backup dancers are always appreciated!
There's nothing to be afraid of! Look at how much everybody loves me!
You don't have to hold back, though. Get as hardcore as you want! Don't be shy!

Now those are some moves that could bring in the big numbers!
Cool moves, darling. I'd love to see more!
Looks like this dance floor doesn't allow shirts.
You know what would make this dance really sexy? No shirt!
Could this be bare chest! Confirmed! Bare chest WILL be visable!
It appears as though the human will be completely topless!
What a scoop! The human will now be topless!
It seems the human will be topless! Will their body live up to the hype!
Before the cake is ready, we need to prepare the topping!
Give me that 110 percent, darling! Show me passion and commitment to stripping!
Let's get some good coverage of that sweet chest, darling! No point hiding it!
The script specifically calls for you to take off your shirt, darling!
You want to show off your fine abs, darling? I'm sure the audience would love to see it!
Let's see some shirtless beauty! Make the crowd go wild!
Oh yes! That's what I call "motivation"!
You're doing a Chippendales show? That'll compliment my act nicely!
Yes, that's going to do very nice in our teen female demographic!
Very nice! I can taste the ratings!
You may not have a shirt or shoes, but I'll still serve you at MY hotel!
This has been Mettaton, reporting live from MTT News!
More on this story as it continues to unfold!
Experts will now analyze the level of beefcake this provides.
And now, a report on MTT Starfait! Now 50 percent less likely to contain actual glass!
There is the icing that will make our cake that much more appetizing!
Now isn't that a lovely glaze?
Nice work! You deserve a promotion! Unlike SOMEBODY...
Fantastic! But we still have more action to see!
The crowd is hungry for you, darling! Can't you feel the excitement?
And the crowd goes wild! Our ratings are rising! Can't you feel it?
You make a fine co-star, darling! My scene will be that much better!
That Chippendales move was glorious, darling! You have a lot of potential!
What a nice performance. But it's only build up to the big finale, darling!
You were eager for this scene, weren't you? That was fast!
I have a dance I recommend. The "No Pants Dance"!
The best dancers let it all hang out. Let's see if you do too!
Red alert! Code Red! Human penis will be visible!
Confirmed! We will be seeing human penis up close!

Oooh, came in a little early on the finale. Can we try that again?
Hey, this was supposed to be a duet! We should have finished together!
The crowd is cheering for you, darling. Obviously I warmed them up.
Your act was marvelous! We make a great team, darling!
I've been looking forward to this! In fact, I've prepared for my big debut!
Finally time for my big debut! I've prepared something special for it!
BURGERPANTS! Drop the rose petals!
They love me! They really love me!
This is for you, darlings! FOR THE FANS!
Mmmm! The spotlight is really helping!
I hope you're all enjoying my performance! Most monsters pay good money for this!
Enjoying your exclusive sneak preview of my next movie?
Don't be shy, darlings! I love the attention!
More lights! More cameras! MORE ACTION!
Ooooh my... I think this scene is starting to wrap up!
Get ready, darlings! Here comes the money shot!
I'm almost there! Get good coverage on this! I need at least four different camera angles!
I'm... READY FOR MY CLOSE UP!
I'm getting close! Make sure you get my good side!
I'm about to drop a bomb! Don't touch that dial!
OOOOOOOH YEEEEES!
Ahhhh... Take five, everyone! I'll be in my trailer.
Ahhhh... Burgerpants, clean this mess up, pronto!
Ahhhh... Good work, Burgerpants. You can take your lunch break now.
Ahhhh... And CUT! That's a wrap!
Ahhhh... I do it for you, darlings! The fans!
Ahhhh... End scene!
Ahhhh... Thank you! Thank you!
Ahhhh... I hope that was beautiful enough for you. Of course it was!
You'll have to try a little harder than that to see indecent! Or buy my DVD "Mettaton Gone Wild!"
Victory! Beautiful victory! And my glorious outfit is untouched!
Thank goodness I perfectly won! Do you know how vicious the tabloids would have been if I had a wardrobe malfunction?
You'll have to try harder than that to change my perfect outfit!
You all look like you could use some MTT Brand Tissues! For your tears and for other obvious reasons!
Thank goodness I didn't get fluid all over my outfit. I have a concert immediately after this.
That game was great, but I think we should do another take for safety. BACK TO ONES, EVERYONE!
I hope I made your Poker game ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL!
I didn't get to go? I mean, "GOOD!" That would have been embarrassing!
Sure glad I won! I have too many sex tapes circulating at the moment, I don't need another one!
I would have preferred an academy award, but I suppose winning a Strip Poker game works too.
This just in! Four losers let a killer robot win at Strip Poker! More after the commercial break!
Next on MTT News! An exclusive look at Mettaton's victory!
Next on MTT News! Mettaton crushing four humans at Strip Poker? Yes, it's true!
Next on MTT News! Are 80 percent of humans in this room terrible at Strip Poker? The answer may surprise you!
This is Mettaton, signing off from MTT News!
Next time on "Stripping with a Killer Robot!" More Bloodshed!
Next time on "Cooking with a Killer Robot!" We use whip cream to make things really sweet!
Next time on "Stripping with a Killer Robot!" Can Mettaton survive two games in a row? Stay tuned!
Stay tuned for more "Stripping with a Killer Robot!" More action! More lewdness!
The only thing that would have made these ratings any higher is if I joined in! Maybe next time!
Well, you didn't get to see me naked, but I hope you enjoyed my dance!
Are you always losing at Strip Poker? Buy the official MTT Strip Poker Strategy Guide today!
You all get gold stars for trying, beauties! Maybe next time you can see a little more of me!
Don't feel bad! Not everybody gets to see me like this! Unless they bought my swimsuit calendar!
Oh, thank goodness I didn't lose again. -YYYYyyyyaaaawn-.
That was so stressful, but luckily I didn't have to strip again. SOOOOO STRESSFUL.
That was close. You almost made me strip. That would have been SO embarrassing!
Yada yada yada, thank goodness I didn't have to masturbate, etc.
I was so lucky I didn't have to masturbate. Etc. etc.
Oh what a shame, darlings! I would have loved to perform for you all!
Don't worry darlings! There's always next time! Maybe then you can see what my mechanical member is capable of!
Dr. Alphys designed my dick to be extremely versatile! Too bad you didn't get to see it in action!
Maybe next time you can see how sexy I can really be! Stay Determined!
Stay tuned! After a brief commercial break, I join in the forfeit ANYWAY!
Stay tuned after this commercial break! We interview the other contestants to get their thoughts on masturbating in public!
Please, line up one at a time for autographs!
Don't be nervous! Snap a picture! Treasure this moment always!
Good work, everybody! If anybody needs me, I'll be in my trailer!
Cut, print, that's a wrap!
Cut! To the editing desk! I thought that game could use a few explosions and CGI.
Good game. I know you'll treasure these memories forever!
Thank you, everyone! I'll be here all week!
This was a fantastic game! All because of me, I know!
Who wants to join my fanclub? Come on, don't be shy!
Encore? Why, of course I'll do an encore!
I love a happy ending!

scene.directive: Step back, human! This area is strictly off limits to non-staff! Turn around before I need to show you the exit myself!
Oh, Mettaton asked you to stop by, huh? Yeah, never heard that one before. You're cruising for some magic bullets, so step off!
Don't get worked up, darling! I can confirm that this human is a personal friend of mine. I asked them to be here, so you can let them in!
My apologies, Mettaton. Nobody informed me you would have a visitor today.
That's okay, darling, no harm done! Take the rest of the day off! But if you could send Burgerpants in before you leave, that would be great!
Aren't you excited, darling? Not everybody gets a private tour into their favorite superstar's dressing room. But, oh, you're so much luckier than just THAT!
You passed the audition I was having during the game! You got the lead supporting role in my next film! Naturally, you work opposite to me!
Now take off your clothes. Our cameraman will be here any moment!
Okay, Frank told me you wanted to see m- OH GOD I'MSORRYI'MSORRYI'MSORRY!
Burgerpants! Just the worthless employee I wanted to see! Don't go!
I'm afraid we can't just let this go unpunished. You barged into my dressing room while we were about to make passionate, beautiful love! You really should have knocked!
As punishment, you need to film us with this camcorder! My next concert could use a publicity boost, and a new "leaked" sex tape is just the thing!
WHAT?! B-b-but I... I REALLY don't want to do that, sir!
Oh, you'll do it, alright. I mean, unless you'd rather I leak the movie that WE made. You know, the one with the costumes...
Don't forget to get some good coverage, Burgerpants. You can't have too many different camera angles.
Now darling, where were we? Oh, right! I was going to ask you which one of your pretty little holes you wanted me to penetrate first?
